physical_appearance: The image displays an invitation card. The invitation card is written totally in green Tamil scripts. There is a patterned border that separates the Tamil scripts from the outer perimeter of the invitation card. There is a slight tear on the right hand side of the invitation card. At the top centre of the invitation, there is an image of a four-armed goddess.
title_text: Wedding invitation of Krishnasamy and Malaiammal at Sri Krishnan Temple, Waterloo Street
subject_terms_2: Invitation cards Marriage Special events Marriage customs and rites
